Thanks for the torrent Youssef and keep going with the series. Interesting characters and unpredictable plot make it good. Nice RIG. Don't know either why Zombies don't attack each other. Maybe they can smell one another or live flesh.
Much appreciated youssef0eddoumali.  Quality of a Skull .. can't go wrong.
Their seems to be no subtitles. Is their a version with english subs.
no use vlc the subs are there

Hahah! I made an account just to comment!

Firstly, HUGE thanks to youssef for uploading these torrents.

The answer to your zombie question is simple. 
Other zombies sound like zombies, and other zombies aren't food. 

You guys should check out the book called "Zombie Survival Guide" by Max Brooks. It's a like a military survival guide for Z-Day, and it covers everything.
